author: Hemsley + Hemsley
method: Blend all of the ingredients and 2-3 tbsp cold water together in a food processor until smooth.  Transfer to to a sterile, airtight jar. This ketchup will keep in the fridge for up to 2 weeks.
ingredients: 200g/7oz tomato purée,  7 anchovies, drained ,  5 tbsp olive oil ,  8 slices jalapeño pepper (from a jar), or to taste,  1 garlic clove, roughly chopped
